# Nestlé Waters - Magento 1 to Adobe Commerce Migration Case Study

We performed a version upgrade from Magento 1 to Adobe Migration. The business witnessed a boost in new customer registrations and a significant hike in the per-day orders.


Back To Work Middle East & Africa Solution B2C | Mobile Commerce SERVICES Adobe Commerce MigrationGrowth SupportSystem Integration INDUSTRY Food & Beverage WEBSITE buyonline.nestlewaters.ae 4 sec Average Load Time 40 New Registrations Per Day 200 Orders Everyday Delivering purity via feature-loaded eCommerce store Unlocking the power of safe drinking water leveraging eCommerce Global Leaders in delivering bottled drinking water with a pleasant taste at an affordable price in more than 20 countries. Pure Life was launched in 1998 to fulfill the hydration needs of consumers with the promise of freshness and quality in every bottle. With a focus on B2C and an association with Krish since 2018, they needed to kick things up to the next level. Krish planned and executed a migration from Magento 1 to Adobe Commerce for Nestlé® Water’s UAE, Bahrain, Lebanon, Egypt and Pakistan regions’ e-Stores while supporting their day-to-day operational needs and getting the migration of three markets underway. "Building a good customer experience does not happen by accident. It happens by design" Clare Muscutt Challenges Defining the stumbling block Outdated Magento 1 Platform Migration from Magento 1 to Adobe Commerce Flawless registration journey No loopholes in the order fulfillment process Seamless sync between Magento and ERP Following Nestlé® security compliance throughout – mandatory to deploy code on production Solution Drinking water just a click away! Nestlé® Pure Life®, formerly Nestlé® Waters, believes in delivering pure bottled drinking water to its customers just affordable prices at a click away, but the outdated eCommerce platform was creating ripples. They needed an up-to-date eCommerce platform. Leveraging the latest Magento version upgrade could integrate intricate customizations and handle their B2C business through and through. The Magento experts at Krish followed the holy grail to build a strategy to help the client enhance their business manytimes over. The Strategy Upgrading the Quality of Water, Upgrading the Quality of Life For a superior eCommerce platform, Krish performed a version upgrade from Magento 1 to Adobe Commerce. The synchronization between the ERP and the Magento platform was optimized for handling issues like updating real time orders, payment details, character limit in CyberSource, and much more. The end-to-end customer journey enhancement reduced the bounce rate significantly. Krish also provided Nestlé® Waters with a 24x7x365 functioning dedicated team to support the system. Seven other eCommerce stores were developed and deployed by Krish in just one year for Lebanon, Pakistan, Bahrain, Qatar, Jordan, Egypt and Saudi Arabia along with the launch and implementation of a mobile application for the UAE, Bahrain, Lebanon and Egypt market while the same for the others are still in progress. Technology Mobile First Design Understood the vision and delivered on a truly on-brand experience. Client Speaks Roopesh Babu Information System and IT Manager "I believe we as a team did an excellent JOB in pulling all the markets in NW MENA onto M2. It was a grueling exercise taking into consideration the number of entities involved in the process. I found your team to be very customer-centric, approachable, reliable, and technically sound. We are glad that we started this engagement with dedicated resources who always ensure high customer satisfaction." Result Anticipating the Future With Adobe Commerce The Adobe Commerce upgrade is a welcoming change for Nestlé® Pure Life®. It optimized the eCommerce website and enhanced the customer experience rendering a prominent brand presence. Also, the website's overall performance has improved with customers experiencing an average load time to be less than 4 sec. The business witnessed a boost in new customer registrations and a significant hike in orders per-day. Client Satisfaction greatly improved with an increase in new potential customers, and retention and re-registration of the existing customers while decreasing the overall customer churn rate.
